response.original_title: Just Another Day: How to Survive an Active Shooter Event on Campus
response.overview: Just Another Day: How to Survive an Active Shooter Event on Campus. A Public Service Announcement by the Towson University Police Department and the Office of Public Safety. Brought to you by Towson University and the Department of Electronic Media and Film.
response.tagline: It starts as Just Another Day.
